title: What are the latest upcoming technologies after 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion Artificial Intelligence is one of the most likely technology that’s going to change the ways of businesses and the Information Technology’s world. AI will be the biggest revolution in the technological world by augmenting natural human expertise to ever greater levels of computational efficiency in human life. AI is basically the combination of different machines that enables a single machine/application to sense, act and behave with what seems like human levels of intelligence. Artificial Intelligence exists, its here, sit on, wait and avail the technology..!!

5g, Folding cell phones, quantum computing, Deep Fake technology, Block Chain integration in peoples lives, microdot OLED tvs. That’s what I can think of. On the medical side, I think you’ll see major strides in the fight against HIV and perhaps Alzheimer’s. Also, maybe new ways to ingest CBD and THC.

AI based Wearable Devices: Wearable AI are devices that mostly use wireless connectivity and AI software that assist the users for various applications such as health monitoring, operations on voice command, and others. There are various types of wearable AI devices, namely, smart watch, smart glasses, smart earwear, smart glove, and others. Factors such as growth in adoption of AI assistants, increased penetration of AI in the healthcare industry, and advancement of IoT and integration of wireless technology in wearable electronic devices drives the market growth. Further, AI assistance for animal and advancement in personal computing is expected to create lucrative opportunities during the wearable AI market forecast period.

Nanofiber cups that feel good are surprisingly rare. Talk to the people from Elm City Market, they have some (I bought one). This could potentially branch out to handbags, linens, clothing (!), towels, and furniture. Omniscient data might be possible with Programmable Heuristics. There is growing evidence of mechanical perpetual motion machines in obscure cases. What are examples of upcoming billion dollar industries that don’t exist today?

Nike is looking into walk on water shoes A.K.A Jesus shoes that cost about $2,000 dollars each 😲 and the flying car will be airborne. And some phone service providers 5G phones will be released. The ps 5 will come out. And last but not the least Xbox series X will come out.

The list of new technologies you will see in 2020 are as follows: Artificial Intelligence and Machine LearningData ScienceCloud ComputingCyber Security the most important oneFront end developerData AnalystPython developer.Block Chain technology. These are the few .

Here is an overview of technological trends that might help recover normality or make it easier for us to understand and navigate a changed reality. 1. Artificial intelligence 2. Extended Reality 3. Vehicle Automation 4. Enhanced Robotics 5. Big Data 6. Blockchain 7. 3D Printing 8. Cloud Services 9. IoT 10. Data Security 11. Analytics Read more: 11 Biggest Technology Trends In 2021 Everyone Must Get Ready For Now

It is less about new technology to solve the massive problems facing humanity, global warming, automation and machine learning re-writing the workplace and the need for national Cyber-Defense. in the case where we have all the needed technology - specifically global warming, we suffer from a complete lack of leadership and political will to do what is right for the future instead of consuming everything today. One major reason I oppose letting individuals who are 70 or older run for elected office. The other problem require new social solutions as technology is the threat.
A computer powered by water. But to actually show you, I myself have already built a transparent computer.
Nanotechnology breakthroughs, such as improved cancer treatment, cheap high quality water purification including removal of viruses, and salt from water, Super-strong materials creation etc.
Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS). You can read more here: Cloud Stocks: The PaaS Landscape | Sramana Mitra I’m seeing company after company doing PaaS right now.
The invention of the internet and online shopping possiblely on line dating then by the end of the year maybe video calling
